objects.text: • 925 Sterling Silver • Premium Design • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner design features a soft, elegant jewelry promotion layout with a radial gradient background transitioning from light blush to peachy pink. At the center, there's a large white circular frame housing a high-quality product image of the jewelry piece. A bold heading (id: "heading") appears at the top in a dark mauve shade for strong visibility. Just beneath it, a cursive subheading (id: "subheading") provides a description in a complementary maroon-pink tone. The price (id: "price") is accented within a rose-toned gradient circle at the top-right of the product for high emphasis. At the bottom, a specification line (id: "description") communicates key attributes in clean sans serif text. A call-to-action button (id: "cta") in bold white text over a deep peach rectangle encourages users to take instant action.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blush Pink: `#FFE8E8`
- Peachy Pink: `#F8D0CB`
- Deep Rose Accent: `#E78B8B`
- Dark Mauve Text: `#94424C`
- Rosewood Accent Text: `#CB6D7D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings dominated by a harmonious palette of soft pink and sparkling white. The base metal is a rose gold tone (#F4A9A0), which gives a warm and luxurious feel. The marquise and round-cut crystals are brilliant white (#FFFFFF) with prismatic sparkles, contrasted by subtle shadows of icy gray (#D9D9D9). The soft blush pink enamel (#F7C6C7) in the teardrop-shaped segments adds a feminine touch. These colors blend smoothly, with the rose gold forming a delicate frame around the bright gems, making them pop. A banner could leverage this palette for a graceful, luxe appeal.
